articles.author: Paola Rosa-Aquino
articles.title: NASA postpones Artemis I moon rocket launch due to fuel leak
articles.description: NASA scrubbed its Saturday launch after engineers detected a liquid hydrogen leak. It's the second launch attempt that's been called off this week.
articles.content:
NASA's long overdue Artemis I moon rocket launch was postponed Saturday, after the launch team encountered fueling issues.
At 7:15 a.m. ET, a leak occurred as engineers increased the pressure on the… [+3006 chars]
